DOC.brief_summary: To investigate effect positive end-expiratory pressure ( PEEP ) intracerebral pressure ( ICP ) intraocular pressure ( IOP ) patient undergo robot assist laparoscopic radical prostatectomy ( RALRP )
DOC.brief_title: Effects PEEP Intracranial Intraocular Pressure Robot-assisted Laparoscopic Radical Prostatectomy
DOC.detailed_description: Application PEEPmay reduce pulmonary complication follow RALRP . Meanwhile , may increase ICP IOP , debate decade . Moreover , Trendelenburg position pneumoperitoneum , mandatory RALRP , may augment elevation ICP IOP . This study aim investigate effect PEEP ICP IOP patient undergo RALRP .
